overview: With the world famous Glastonbury Festival getting underway today, we've rounded up the Manchester acts who will be performing at the annual Somerset music festival this year.  Manchester band The Courteeners are among a number of high-profile headline acts for the event, which includes international stars such as Kanye West, Pharrell Williams, The Who and Mary J. Blige.  Coming off the back of a hugely successful gig in front of 20,000 people at Heaton Park earlier this month, The Courteeners are currently riding high and are also set to perform at V Festival, T In The Park and Ibiza Rocks later this year.
title: The Courteeners: Live at Glastonbury 2015
